faqs.question: What is SitesGPT.com?
faqs.answer: SitesGPT.com is an innovative online website builder that utilizes advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) to assist users in building high-quality, professional websites instantly.

faqs.question: How much does it cost to use SitesGPT?
faqs.answer: Our basic plan is completely free! With this, you get a home page hosted on the SitesGPT.com domain (e.g., SitesGPT.com/yoursite). However, we also offer upgraded plans with premium features and dedicated, custom domain names (e.g, www.yoursite.com) at an additional cost.

faqs.question: What features are included in the free plan?
faqs.answer: The free plan includes AI-powered website design, hosting on the SitesGPT.com domain, and basic templates to get your website up and running.

faqs.question: What are the advantages of upgrading to a premium plan?
faqs.answer: Upgraded plans come with a plethora of benefits including a dedicated domain name, additional pages, premium design templates, advanced SEO tools, higher bandwidth and storage, priority customer support, and more.

faqs.question: How does the AI website builder work?
faqs.answer: Our AI-powered builder asks you a few questions about your site's purpose, preferences, and content. Based on your answers, the AI then creates a tailored website, optimizing design and user experience.

faqs.question: Can I use my own domain name?
faqs.answer: Yes, if you're on one of our premium plans, you can use a dedicated domain name of your choice. You can purchase your domain name right here on SitesGPT or you can point a domain from another provider to your sites built on SitesGPT.

faqs.question: What happens if I decide to cancel my premium subscription?
faqs.answer: If you choose to cancel, your website will revert to the free plan. Your content will remain, but some premium features and your dedicated domain will be deactivated.

faqs.question: How secure is my website with SitesGPT?
faqs.answer: We prioritize your site's security. All SitesGPT websites come with SSL certification and we regularly update our systems to protect against potential security threats.

faqs.question: Can I edit my website after the AI has built it?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! While our AI provides a strong foundation for your site, you have complete control to edit, modify, and customize as you see fit right within your personal dashboard.

faqs.question: Are there any content restrictions on my website?
faqs.answer: Yes, we prohibit content related to pornographic topics, human trafficking, illegal drugs, prostitution, and any other illegal goods or services. Please refer to our terms & conditions for detailed information.

faqs.question: Does SitesGPT offer customer support?
faqs.answer: Yes, all users can access our help center and FAQ. Premium plan subscribers receive priority customer support, ensuring quicker response times.

faqs.question: Can I migrate my existing website to SitesGPT?
faqs.answer: Currently, we don't offer direct migration tools. However, you can easily recreate and enhance your website using our AI builder.

faqs.question: Do I need any technical or coding skills to use SitesGPT?
faqs.answer: Not at all! Our platform is designed to be user-friendly and requires no coding or technical skills. SitesGPT does all the work!

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Simply answer a few questions about your desired website, and let our AI do the rest! Click here to get started.

faqs.question: Can I add e-commerce features to my site?
faqs.answer: Yes, if you are currently using an e-commerce platform such as Shopify, BigCommerce, OpenCart, etc.; simply specify the URL of your existing store and SitesGPT will integrate your products into your new website.
